name: 王佩淳
objective: 本課程之目的在探討如何運用計量分析方法求解工程與管理相關的決策問題。整個過程包括：問題分析、數量模式的建構、問題求解、成本效益分析、模型規劃設計與執行等步驟。課程內容主要以應用案例說明為主，讓同學瞭解理論如何與實際問題結合，也會介紹最佳化計算軟體來求解數學模式並輔助說明所得數據之意涵。
schedule:
W1 Introduction to Management Science
W2 Modeling with Linear programming
W3 Linear Programming: Sensitivity Analysis and Interpretation of Solution
W4 Linear programming with application
W5 Linear programming with application
W6 Distribution and Network Models: transportation problem
W7 Distribution and Network Models: assignment problem
W8 Distribution and Network Models: shortest route
W9 Midterm exam
W10 Goal programming
W11 Multi-objective decision-making method
W12 Integer linear programming with application
W13 Integer linear programming with application 
W14 Solution algorithm for integer programming
W15 Decision analysis
W16 Decision analysis with probability
W17 Decision analysis with application
W18 Final exam
materials:
David R. Anderson, Dennis J. Sweeney, Thomas A. Williams, and Kipp Martin, An Introduction to Management Science: Quantitative Approaches to Decision Making, 13edition, 2011, South-Western, a Cengage Learning Company.
